mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(cart_num, useridx, detail_num1, detail_num2, product_num, cart_reg_date, qty, cart_update_date) VALUES(cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{useridx}, #{detail_num1}, #{detail_num2, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{product_num}, SYSDATE, #{qty}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET qty = #{qty}, cart_update_date = SYSDATE WHERE detail_num2 = #{detail_num2} AND useridx = #{useridx}
mapper.select: SELECT cart_num, useridx, detail_num1, detail_num2, qty, product_num, cart_reg_date, cart_update_date FROM cart WHERE detail_num2 = #{detail_num2} AND useridx = #{useridx}

SELECT c.cart_num, useridx, c.detail_num1, c.detail_num2, c.product_num, c.qty, c.cart_reg_date, c.cart_update_date, product_name, d.option_value, d2.option_value option_value2, product_summary, p.product_price FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_num = p.product_num JOIN optionDetail d ON c.detail_num1 = d.detail_num LEFT OUTER JOIN optionDetail d2 ON c.detail_num2 = d2.detail_num WHERE useridx = #{useridx} ORDER BY cart_reg_date DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE cart_reg_date + 15 < SYSDATE
mapper.select: SELECT m1.useridx, m.usership, m1.user_name, m1.reg_date, m2.email, m2.tel, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, m2.addr1, m2.addr2 FROM userall m JOIN user1 m1 ON m.useridx = m1.useridx LEFT OUTER JOIN user2 m2 ON m1.useridx = m2.useridx WHERE m1.useridx = #{useridx}

SELECT p.product_num, u.useridx, zzim_date, zzim_update_date, p.product_name, p.product_price, u.user_name, p.product_summary FROM zzim z JOIN user1 u ON z.useridx = u.useridx JOIN product p ON z.product_num = p.product_num WHERE u.useridx = #{useridx} ORDER BY zzim_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zzim(product_num, useridx, zzim_date, zzim_update_date) VALUES(#{product_num}, #{useridx}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM totalorder t JOIN order_detail od ON t.order_num = od.order_num WHERE t.useridx = #{useridx} AND order_delete = 0

SELECT DISTINCT t.order_num, TO_CHAR(order_datetime, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order_datetime, order_delete, shipping, total_amount, order_sale, order_point, useridx, order_delete, cp_num, tracking_no, tr_status, transports_memo, completion_datetime, address_num, address1, address2, recipient_name, recipient_phone, detail_num1, detail_num2, od_price, od_count, od_total_amount, change_num FROM totalorder t JOIN transports tp ON t.order_num = tp.order_num JOIN delivery dl ON tp.order_num = dl.order_num JOIN order_detail od ON t.order_num = od.order_num WHERE useridx = #{useridx} AND order_delete = 0

SELECT p.product_num, p.product_name, po.option_name, od.detail_num, od.option_value, po2.option_name option_name2, od2.detail_num detail_num2, od2.option_value option_value2 FROM product p JOIN productOption po ON p.product_num = po.product_num LEFT OUTER JOIN productOption po2 ON po.option_num = po2.parent JOIN optionDetail od ON po.option_num = od.option_num LEFT OUTER JOIN optionDetail od2 ON po2.option_num = od2.option_num WHERE od.detail_num = #{detail_num1} AND od2.detail_num = #{detail_num2}
